description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=3/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=2/3. A virus. Mad animals. And a squirrel in a hazard suit. Fluffy: Operation Overkill is run and gun gameplay at its finest with powerful weapons, devastating special attacks, physics powered violence, epic boss fights and a rewarding skill kill highscore system. Oh yeah, and it has got zombies. Get ready for a rollercoaster ride into hell!
